exclusionConstraintTest.description: Test data to verify exclusion constraint (input item cannot be returned)
exclusionConstraintTest.expectedBehavior: Posterior samples for 'esh' should be zero or near-zero when 'esh' is the input item

multipleInputsTest.description: Test data with multiple known input items
multipleInputsTest.expectedBehavior: Model should handle multiple inputs appropriately

unknownInputsTest.expectedBehavior: Model should use uniform prior over possible inputs
